thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Investors Suffer Heavy Losses on Bets Against Volatility

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Investors Suffer Heavy Losses on Bets Against Volatility
text:
The return of volatility is claiming casualties.
In the years since the financial crisis, shorting volatility has become a popular and profitable strategy for investors as bond yields plunged around the world and stocks moved placidly upward.
That trade became disrupted this week when the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 4.6% Monday and... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
